title: CorsiBlock

description.text: This was my thesis project which was part of a series of cognitive games for visual/auditory memory improvement of children and elders

bulletPoints: Performed as Software Architect and Unity Developer developing and architecting game components
Developed 2D and 3D Corsi Block for visual/auditory memory improvement of children and elders (demo)
Led a junior programmer to develop a Dementia assessment game
